doc.title: One Last Kill
doc.plot: On the eve of his execution, multiple murderer Curtis Starks is given the opportunity to make a final statement on video before his date with the Gas Chamber. His final words are gripping, twisted and disturbed. A haunting vision into the warped mind of a brilliant but insane killer. However, it pales in comparison to what Curtis has in store for three top psychologists and a young cameraman who become trapped in his world. - A world made up of a bizarre, life and death game of psychological torment, pitting three highly educated, gifted doctors against one social deviant. ...Seemingly a mismatch... Unfortunately for the psychologists, it just may be.
